Peggys Cove Lighthouse Stylized Vinyl Decal

Real signs. Real people. Niagara built. Vinyl Decal – Discover the best vinyl decal in 2025! Vinyl Decal now available. Capture the essence of Nova Scotia's iconic Peggy's Cove with this vibrant vinyl decal. Featuring a stylized red-and-white lighthouse against a moody ocean backdrop, this design adds coastal charm to any surface. Premium outdoor-grade vinyl Weather-resistant & UV-protected Easy application on cars, laptops, windows, and gear Multiple sizes available (specify in product options) Perfect for travelers, maritime enthusiasts, or anyone celebrating Nova Scotia's coastal beauty!
